org.cyclops.cyclopscore.config.configurable

Class ConfigurableBlockContainerGui

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.registries.IForgeRegistryEntry.Impl<net.minecraft.block.Block>
      • net.minecraft.block.Block
        • net.minecraft.block.BlockContainer
          • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.config.configurable.ConfigurableBlockContainer
            • org.cyclops.cyclopscore.config.configurable.ConfigurableBlockContainerGui
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.block.ITileEntityProvider, net.minecraftforge.registries.IForgeRegistryEntry<net.minecraft.block.Block>, IDynamicModelElement, IConfigurable<BlockConfig>, IConfigurableBlock, IGuiContainerProvider, IGuiContainerProviderConfigurable

    public abstract class ConfigurableBlockContainerGui
extends ConfigurableBlockContainer
implements IGuiContainerProviderConfigurable
    Block with a tile entity with a GUI that can hold ExtendedConfigs. The container and GUI must be set inside the constructor of the extension.
